item.description:
Ready for Spring?

Some say it's already here, but I know there are many who are counting the days til the breeze turns sweet and the thermal layers come off. I sure am! With that I am posting the first event for Twisted Touring in 2012 very near to our historic opening day, the first day of spring!

Hopefully the weather for this event on March 24th will be as nice as it was today (Feb 1st ~ 60 Degrees!) We will descend on the Marriott Riverside Lounge for breakfast. Before & after we'll show and tell about our scooters. Get out the Plexus & chamois and make your ride shine then come and show it off, make friends and influence those looking to upgrade or get in the game.

If you have non-scooting friends thinking of buying, this is a great opportunity for them to get it straight from the horses mouth and see scooters in their natural setting.

Breakfast is $20 for the buffet, though you can get less expensive things - not the greatest food, but they have lots of seating and big tables. We have had groups as large as 15 other years, lets do it again!

Looking forward to seeing you there!

So the plan is to ride up to Gloucester after breakfast, I'll be staying there and send you all off on you own adventures. We'll take 95 up to 128,

 

Paul
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the bunch of scooters in the back of the parking lot
item.name: Opening Day Show & Tell
